solution_line_template: For an {total_dive_hours}-hour dive, she will use her {primary_tank_hours}-hour primary tanks and will need supplemental tanks for {total_dive_hours}-{primary_tank_hours}=<<{total_dive_hours}-{primary_tank_hours}={additional_hours_needed}>>{additional_hours_needed} additional hours.

Since each supplemental tank holds {hours_per_supplemental_tank} hour of oxygen, for {additional_hours_needed} hours she will need {additional_hours_needed}/{hours_per_supplemental_tank}=<<{additional_hours_needed}/{hours_per_supplemental_tank}={num_supplemental_tanks}>>{num_supplemental_tanks} supplemental tanks.
